title: 'They are treating us like a game': Migrants caught in border standoff struggle to survive
content:
1. 'They are treating us like a game': Migrants caught in border standoff struggle to survive  CNN
  2. EU to keep fighting Belarus's "weaponization" of migrants  The Washington Post
  3. New evidence of Belarus sending migrants across its border - BBC News  BBC News
  4. Freezing to death: the migrants left to die on the Poland-Belarus border – video  The Guardian
  5. Lithuania calls for new of EU migration pact, fence to stand up to Belarus  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 私たちをゲームのように扱っている」。国境での睨み合いに巻き込まれた移民たちは、必死に生き延びようとする
'他们把我们当做游戏'。陷入边境对峙的移民为生存而挣扎
'他們把我們當做遊戲'。陷入邊境對峙的移民爲生存而掙扎
